pages.text: $(l:magical_blocks/midnight_solution)Midnight Solution$(/l), everywhere. What must have happened here to turn whole swaths of land into this dead wasteland? Some terrible accident, for sure. Whatever - or whoever - was responsible for this might have gone through a similar path as yourself.... only much more tragic.
The $(italic)things$() that grow here - to call them plants would be an outrage even to $(item)Dead Bushes$() - look anything but healthy.
